Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class CloudsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CloudsManager
public class CloudsManager extends Object
CloudsManger keeps track of all information regarding clouds with their students. Notify method send changes from CloudsManager to VirtualView.

    • CloudsManager

      public CloudsManager(int numberOfPlayer, Bag bag)
      CloudsManager constructor, create an arrayList of Clouds.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayer - in this game;
      bag - contains the student tokens to be extracted;

  • Method Details

    • refreshStudentsCloud

      public void refreshStudentsCloud()
      Put students on clouds. Each cloud has 3 or 4 students on it, depending on the number of players.

    • restoreClouds

      public void restoreClouds(int cloudIndex, int[] students)
      Restore clouds.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - reference of cloud to restore;
      students - on that cloud in the last game;

    • removeStudents

      public int[] removeStudents(int cloudIndex) throws NotAllowedException
      Given the index of a cloud, it empties the cloud and returns the array of the students on the cloud.
      Parameters:
      cloudIndex - reference of cloud;
      Returns:
      the array of the students on the cloud;
      Throws:
      NotAllowedException - throw in case the cloud is empty;
